ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Get a log entry
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Get a log entry
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Get details for a specific incident log entry. This method provides additional information you can use to get at raw event data.
A log of all the events that happen to an Incident, and these are exposed as Log Entries.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#log-entries)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Get a log entry

Get details for a specific incident log entry. This method provides additional information you can use to get at raw event data. A log of all the events that happen to an Incident, and these are exposed as Log Entries. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#log-entries)

Method: Get

OperationID: getLogEntry

EndPoint:

/log_entries/{id}
